attributes.action: Immediately stop illegal immigrants and refugees crossing from France.
attributes.additional_details: To help recover our economy and help the British people live above the breadline.
attributes.background: Do as their constituents voted for them to do and stop the illegal immigrants and refugees coming to our country when we have homeless people and families on the breadline but our government are giving our money away to feed, water and house them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
